languages.text: "О нем не беспокойтесь — Глейто полностью исправен. Недавно закончил проверять все протоколы, и он подхватывает приказы с полуслова. Не буду кривить душой — мне этого очень не хватало".
"You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."
languages.original_text: "О нем не беспокойтесь — Глейто полностью исправен. Недавно закончил проверять все протоколы, и он подхватывает приказы с полуслова. Не буду кривить душой — мне этого очень не хватало".

traits.locale_text: "Do not worry on his account — Glaito is right as rain. I recently finished checking all his protocols, from basic to complex — his responses are instantaneous. I've missed this... I've missed this a lot."

"Do not worry on his account — Glaito is right as rain. I recently finished checking all his protocols, from basic to complex — his responses are instantaneous. I've missed this... I've missed this a lot."

"Do not worry on his account — Glaito is right as rain. I recently finished checking all his protocols, from basic to complex — his responses are instantaneous. I've missed this... I've missed this a lot."

"Do not worry on his account — Glaito is right as rain. I recently finished checking all his protocols, from basic to complex — his responses are instantaneous. I've missed this... I've missed this a lot."
"You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."
"You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."

languages.text: 「グライトのことなら心配いりません。最近、彼のすべてのプロトコルを確認し終えましたが、反応は瞬時です。私は…彼の同伴が恋しくなかったといえば嘘になります」
languages.original_text: "You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトのことなら心配いりません。最近、彼のすべてのプロトコルを確認し終えましたが、反応は瞬時です。私は…彼の同伴が恋しくなかったといえば嘘になります」

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Euch keine Sorgen um Glaito machen. Ich habe kürzlich die Überprüfung all seiner Protokolle abgeschlossen – alle Reaktionen verzögerungsfrei. Ich ... muss zugeben, ich habe seine Gesellschaft vermisst."
languages.original_text: "You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Euch keine Sorgen um Glaito machen. Ich habe kürzlich die Überprüfung all seiner Protokolle abgeschlossen – alle Reaktionen verzögerungsfrei. Ich ... muss zugeben, ich habe seine Gesellschaft vermisst."

languages.text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas pour Glaito. J'ai récemment achevé la vérification de l'intégralité de ses protocoles, toutes ses réponses sont instantanées. Je ne vais pas vous mentir... sa compagnie m'avait manqué. »
languages.original_text: "You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous inquiétez pas pour Glaito. J'ai récemment achevé la vérification de l'intégralité de ses protocoles, toutes ses réponses sont instantanées. Je ne vais pas vous mentir... sa compagnie m'avait manqué. »

languages.text: «No se preocupe por Glaito. He llevado a cabo una comprobación de todos sus protocolos; sus respuestas son instantáneas. Yo... no fingiré que no he echado de menos su compañía».
languages.original_text: "You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."

traits.locale_text: «No se preocupe por Glaito. He llevado a cabo una comprobación de todos sus protocolos; sus respuestas son instantáneas. Yo... no fingiré que no he echado de menos su compañía».

languages.text: “不必担心格雷托的事情。不久之前，我检查了它所有的协议，它的反应非常灵敏。我……如果说我不想念它的陪伴，那是在自欺欺人。”
languages.original_text: "You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."

traits.locale_text: “不必担心格雷托的事情。不久之前，我检查了它所有的协议，它的反应非常灵敏。我……如果说我不想念它的陪伴，那是在自欺欺人。”

languages.text: "Glaito için endişelenmene gerek yok. Kısa süre önce tüm protokollerini kontrol ettim. Anlık tepkiler verebiliyor. Yoldaşlığını özlemediğimi söyleyemem."
languages.original_text: "You need not concern yourself with Glaito. I recently finished checking all his protocols — his responses are instantaneous. I... cannot pretend I haven't missed his companionship."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito için endişelenmene gerek yok. Kısa süre önce tüm protokollerini kontrol ettim. Anlık tepkiler verebiliyor. Yoldaşlığını özlemediğimi söyleyemem."
